about_the_game:
Astra cannot shake the feeling that she’s reached the end of her life. When she receives a sudden text from her sister wanting to reconnect, she’s led outside her room into the world she’s hid away from for so long in order to become EXISTENT. Alongside newfound friends, she will navigate what has become of the world and learn what it means to survive and fight back. What will you make of this tale? Will you travel alongside Astra and uncover the truth? Or will you stop thinking and let it all pass you by?

your EXISTENCE has been noticed... defend yourself against enemy attention or be overwhelmed and forced to retreat. be brave. be strong. be EXISTENT.


  • Explore and discover the world within and beyond Astra’s childhood home, full of puzzles, mysteries and weirdos
  • Meet new friends to help Astra navigate the Real
  • Shoot, dodge, absorb and retaliate in shmup-style combat encounters
  • Customize Astra's loadout with meaningful objects, experiences, companions, and parts of her Self
  • Obtain and use items?? Why is this a bullet point
  • Original story, art and music by award-winning composer Lena Raine

content_descriptors.notes: Mature discussion of topics such as self-worth, alienation, existence, sexuality and gender. Violence against cop-adjacent oppressors. A couple characters smoke. Implied death.

Astra cannot shake the feeling that she’s reached the end of her life. name: ANOTHEREAL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Modern Windows (??)
  • Processor: Yes
  • Graphics: Yes
  • Sound Card: Please
  • VR Support: Nope
  • Additional Notes: Never stop thinking
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Absolutely
  • Graphics: idk man it's pixel art
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster (do they still make those)
  • VR Support: I mean you can try
  • Additional Notes: What do you think of all this?

short_description: Accompany Astra as she discovers the world outside her solitude and uncovers the mysteries of the Real. Engage in shmup-style combat encounters to leave an impact and fight back against the ones who would challenge her EXISTENCE.
